lines.text:
[walks into Tex's room]
Tex? You alright? You lose Something?

[laying under his bed with only his feet sticking out]
It's kinda nice down here. Cool and Quiet.
Yeah, well maybe you should hurry it up so you can come have breakfast under the kitchen table. Then maybe you can catch a ride under the school bus!

[Gets up from under his bed and wraps a blanket around him]
You would like that wouldn't you?
You may think of one yes or no question to yourself.

[He sees a horse pass by and thinks about Rowdy]
Yeah, Ok.
I am sorry the answer is no.

[to mason about why he sells dope]
You don't have people depending on you, to take care of!

[In Lem's new car]
Come on, let's go for a ride!

[Points at Tex]
What do you think he is? A baboon!
And Tex, I don't want another report on "Smokey the Cow Horse"
Yeah, but I read it everytime
Why don't you read another book by the same author?
You mean, that guy, wrote another book?
